abstract: The plug-in hybrid luxury sports sedan recently received the rating from the E.P.A., a reflection of the car’s estimated fuel economy when its gasoline generator was engaged.
snippet: The plug-in hybrid luxury sports sedan recently received the rating from the E.P.A., a reflection of the car’s estimated fuel economy when its gasoline generator was engaged.

headline.main: The Fisker Karma's 20 M.P.G. Sticker: A Scarlet Letter?
